description: This course provides students with the opportunity to gain at least 120 hours of practical experience in the application of theoretical concepts and knowledge in a host organisation in Australia or overseas that have direct links with the students chosen plan of study. Students are assessed on the completion of specific work during their placement that is of mutual benefit to the student and the organisation. Students must work with their placement provider to complete a placement plan that is beneficial to the provider and of sufficient technical content to meet the academic requirements of the course. To be eligible to enrol in this course students must have completed a minimum of #20 (units) towards the degree. The placement plan must be authorised by the provider and be supplied at the time of application for enrolment in the course. Applications can be submitted through https://placements.uq.edu.au/.
